itemDescription: former model and creative director of American Vogue magazine

wikipedia_page.main: Pamela Rosalind Grace Coddington (born 20 April 1941), known as Grace Coddington, is a Welsh former model and former creative director at large of American Vogue magazine. Coddington is known for the creation of large, complex and dramatic photoshoots. A Guardian profile wrote that she "has produced some of fashion's most memorable imagery. Her pictures might be jolly and decadent or moody and mysterious."
